name: Awakening of the Charmers
text: Reveal 1 "Charmer" monster or "Familiar-Possessed" monster in your hand, return 1 card from your hand to your Deck, and Set 1 "Awakening of the Possessed" from outside your Deck. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that has "Familiar-Possessed - Aussa", "Familiar-Possessed - Eria", "Familiar-Possessed - Hiita", and "Familiar-Possessed - Wynn". This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
